cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.recipe: Muddle mint leaves and lime juice. Add rum, sugar, and ice. Stir and top with soda water. Garnish with mint leaves and lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.recipe: Shake vodka, cranberry juice, lime juice, and triple sec with ice. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.
